channel.title: CVE Feed for Ricoh Company, Ltd. -- JavaTM Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ricoh Company, Ltd. -- JavaTM Platform

item.title: CVE-2024-41995|2024-08-06T06:51:51.329Z -- ricoh%20company%2C%20ltd. -- javatm%20platform
item.description: Initialization of a resource with an insecure default vulnerability exists in JavaTM Platform Ver.12.89 and earlier. If this vulnerability is exploited, the product may be affected by some known TLS1.0 and TLS1.1 vulnerabilities. As for the specific products/models/versions of MFPs and printers that contain JavaTM Platform, see the information provided by the vendor.
